title: Cash In via Linked International Partners
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

[How do I link my Payoneer to GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900002482846-How-do-I-link-my-Payoneer-to-GCash)

[How do I cash in to GCash using Payoneer?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900002482806-How-do-I-cash-in-to-GCash-using-Payoneer)

[How do I link my PayPal to GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360019948834-How-do-I-link-my-PayPal-to-GCash)

[How do I cash in to GCash using PayPal?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360020281973-How-do-I-cash-in-to-GCash-using-PayPal)
